CustomField.description: Denotes the assignee type. If the type is 'Role', this field is the role name. For type Approval Matrix, this value is a string of the form "Level X", where X ranges from 1 to 6. This field is not used when the assignee type is user.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Denotes the assignee type. If the type is 'Role', this field is the role name. For type Approval Matrix, this value is a string of the form "Level X", where X ranges from 1 to 6. This field is not used when the assignee type is user.
CustomField.label: Assignee Value
